description: PM Modi chairs high level meeting on the drought and water scarcity situation with Andhra Pradesh CM PM Modi directs setting up of a task force to study economic impact of drip irrigation in Maharash
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
During our meeting today, CM Nara Chandrababu Naidu briefed me on the drought relief measures being undertaken in AP. AP has a target 20 lakh hectares for micro-irrigation. I welcome such efforts. We discussed global best practices & research in this field.

There was also a brief presentation by Naidu ji on AP’s usage of technology to get real-time updates on water & agriculture from the ground. http://www.narendramodi.in/pm-reviews-drought-and-water-scarcity-situation-at-high-level-meeting-with-andhra-pradesh-cm-452458
